---
title: Genailib_wl Console Docs
---

Welcome to the console documentation for Genailib_wl! This guide will help you understand how to use the command-line interface to interact with OpenAI's chat API using the Genailib_wl library.

### Usage

To run the console interface, you can use the following command:

```bash
❯ python genailib_wl_folder/console.py
# -p Tell me something interesting
Connection was Successful
[Response from OpenAI based on the default prompt]

❯ python genailib_wl_folder/console.py --prompt "Tell me a joke"
Connection was Successful
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!

❯ python genailib_wl_folder/console.py -p "What's the weather like today?"
Connection was Successful
I'm sorry, I don't have access to real-time data. Please check a weather service.
```
